item.description:
Cost: $10 per person
Club Rentals: - $8.00

Hi Everyone -

My first thought was to try Ponkapog for this week at golf but I'm told after reviewing members from the group that it's not the best place to play. Specifically, they really don't take care of the course so why spend our money and play there. In an effort to keep things fairly inexpensive let's try our old standby at Rockland and try another 9 holes. We can talk and see how to proceed for the rest of the season as it's getting darker sooner.

Hope to see you there!!

Note:

Please check your email that afternoon for any cancellation from me.

*SSFMG and its organizers are not responsible for any injuries to participants or damage to equipment.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Directions:

group.name: The South Shore Fitness Meetup Group

item.name: Golf Anyone - 9 Holes!!!
